Hi Radioman,

I might be raising this issue again which has been posted earlier. Even though i have code which you have mentioned

 

void Markers_CollectionChanged(object sender, System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)
      {
          if (e.Action == System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add)
          {
              foreach (GMapMarker marker in e.NewItems)
                  marker.ForceUpdateLocalPosition(this);
          }
      }

The markers added to the MapControl does not show until i perform some operations in Map UI. I am getting the markers from Web service. Any help please.

Regards,
G.Balaji
